description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共大理市委书记、大理市市长，后因严重违纪违法被开除党籍和公职。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Secretary of the CPC Dali Municipal Committee and Mayor of Dali. He was later expelled from the Communist Party of China and dismissed from public office for serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党大理白族自治州的纪律检查机关和中华人民共和国大理白族自治州的监察机关。
description.en: The disciplinary inspection agency of the Communist Party of China and the supervisory agency of the People's Republic of China in Dali Bai Autonomous Prefecture.

nodes.id: 洱海生态保护不力事件

zh-cn: 洱海生态保护不力事件

description.zh-cn: 指2018至2019年间，因大理市政府在洱海生态保护方面工作不力、项目推进缓慢而引发的问责事件。
description.en: Refers to the accountability incident triggered between 2018 and 2019 due to the Dali municipal government's ineffective work and slow project progress in the ecological protection of Erhai Lake.

nodes.id: 大理市违法扣押征用防疫口罩事件

zh-cn: 大理市违法扣押征用防疫口罩事件

description.zh-cn: 指2020年2月，2019冠状病毒病疫情初期，大理市政府违法扣押和征用了一批其他地区采购的口罩而引发的争议和问责事件。
description.en: Refers to the controversy and accountability incident in February 2020, during the early stages of the COVID-19 pandemic, when the Dali municipal government illegally seized and requisitioned a batch of masks procured by other regions.

nodes.id: 中央第六环境保护督察组

zh-cn: 中央第六环境保护督察组

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，高志宏的前任中共大理市委书记。
description.en: Chinese political figure, predecessor of Gao Zhihong as Secretary of the CPC Dali Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，高志宏的继任中共大理市委书记。
description.en: Chinese political figure, successor of Gao Zhihong as Secretary of the CPC Dali Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，高志宏的前任大理市市长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, predecessor of Gao Zhihong as Mayor of Dali.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，高志宏的继任大理市市长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, successor of Gao Zhihong as Mayor of Dali.
Expelled from the Communist Party of China on December 13, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 2022年6月17日，高志宏因涉嫌严重违纪违法接受纪律审查和监察调查。2022年12月13日，被开除党籍与公职。调查发现其存在为谋求职务晋升和减轻处分而行贿等行为。
description.en: On June 17, 2022, Gao Zhihong was placed under disciplinary review and supervisory investigation for suspected serious violations of discipline and law. On December 13, 2022, he was expelled from the Party and dismissed from public office. The investigation found that he had engaged in bribery to seek promotion and lighter punishment.

relationships.target: 大理师范高等专科学校
中国共产党大理市委员会
中国共产党大理市委员会

relationships.source: 洱海生态保护不力事件

description.zh-cn: 因洱海生态保护工作不力、部分项目推进缓慢，高志宏被给予党内警告处分。
description.en: Gao Zhihong received an intra-Party warning for ineffective ecological protection of Erhai Lake and slow progress on some projects.

relationships.source: 大理市违法扣押征用防疫口罩事件

description.zh-cn: 因大理市违法扣押征用防疫口罩事件，被给予党内严重警告处分、免职处理。
description.en: Due to the incident of illegally seizing and requisitioning anti-epidemic masks in Dali, he was given a serious intra-Party warning and removed from his post.

relationships.source: 中央第六环境保护督察组
relationships.target: 洱海生态保护不力事件

description.zh-cn: 中央第六环境保护督察组在对云南省开展“回头看”时，发现了洱海生态保护工作不力等问题，从而推动了对相关责任人的问责。
description.en: During its 'look back' inspection in Yunnan Province, the 6th Central Environmental Protection Inspection Team discovered issues such as ineffective ecological protection of Erhai Lake, which prompted accountability actions against those responsible.

description.zh-cn: 高志宏接替孔贵华担任中共大理市委书记。
description.en: Gao Zhihong succeeded Kong Guihua as Secretary of the CPC Dali Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 高志宏被免去中共大理市委书记职务后，由罗永斌接任。
description.en: After Gao Zhihong was removed from the post of Secretary of the CPC Dali Municipal Committee, Luo Yongbin succeeded him.

description.zh-cn: 高志宏接替李福安担任大理市市长。
description.en: Gao Zhihong succeeded Li Fu'an as Mayor of Dali.

description.zh-cn: 杜淑敢接替高志宏担任大理市市长。
description.en: Du Shugan succeeded Gao Zhihong as Mayor of Dali.
